snippet.title: Monster Hunter Stories 2: Wings of Ruin - Trailer 5
snippet.description:
It's said that a beat of Razewing Ratha's wings can bring about waves of destruction... but you have the power of kinship!

Cast aside any doubt and fulfill your destiny!

First #MHStories2 free update brings the Palamute from #MHRise on July 15!

Start your journey early on Nintendo Switch with the Monster Hunter Stories 2: Wings of Ruin Trial Ver., available June 25th, and take your story progress into the full game, when it launches July 9th!

[Nintendo eShop]
https://www.nintendo.com/games/detail/monster-hunter-stories-2-wings-of-ruin-switch/

[Steam]
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1277400/Monster_Hunter_Stories_2_Wings_of_Ruin/

#MonsterHunter

Japanese https://youtu.be/mhK7IIf6lJo
French https://youtu.be/Z9uhdsyGbFk
Italian https://youtu.be/1vdjRAWgErs
German https://youtu.be/J8WjFIRLA7Y
Spanish https://youtu.be/RQQxlfnj6Zk
Russian https://youtu.be/2xYxV3VjNvs
Polish https://youtu.be/_jrz2m_F8-w
Brazilian Portuguese https://youtu.be/SCQLTCc27Ec
Traditional Chinese https://youtu.be/JSYVof8rZZQ
Simplified Chinese https://youtu.be/SrA7jLWJOKQ
Korean https://youtu.be/fYN2MamAq2Y
